PROFIL_TEXT_1: This form is mandatory. It is used to comply with the requirements of American tax regulations (FACTA), the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (AEOI), and the European Union with which France has signed agreements.
PROFIL_TEXT_2: Under the FATCA regulation, it is necessary to determine if you are a U.S. citizen or resident.
PROFIL_TEXT_3: Under the AEOI and EU regulations, it is necessary to identify the list of countries where you are considered a tax resident.
PROFIL_LEGAL_DETAILS: Muteni Bank cannot and should not provide any advice to its clients regarding their FATCA or AEOI status declaration. For any additional information regarding FACTA or AEOI elements, you should seek the services of a tax advisor.
FORM_STEP_1_TEXT_2: All fields are mandatory except those marked as optional
FORM_STEP_2_TEXT_2: All fields are mandatory except those marked as optional
FORM_STEP_2_CLIENT_NUMBER_INPUT_SUBTEXT: Please note that the deceased may have multiple client numbers. Therefore, the number displayed here may differ from the one on the form received by mail.
FORM_STEP_3_TEXT_2: All fields are mandatory except those marked as optional
FORM_STEP_4_TEXT_1: The concept of tax residence is defined by each country.
FORM_STEP_4_TEXT_2: Please refer to the definition provided by the tax authorities of the relevant countries. For more information, visit their official websites.
FORM_STEP_4_TAX_RESIDENCE_FRANCE_LABEL: Are you a tax resident in France (criteria on impots.gouv.fr)?
FORM_STEP_4_TAX_RESIDENCE_OTHER_LABEL: Are you a tax resident of at least one country other than France?
FORM_STEP_5_TAX_RESIDENCE_US_LABEL: Are you a tax resident of the United States?
FORM_STEP_5_TEXT_1: ‚ùó If you are not an American citizen and not a US resident but were born in the United States, please provide a certificate of loss or non-acquisition of American nationality (or any other proof).
FORM_STEP_6_TEXT_1: Please indicate all countries other than France where you are considered a tax resident and provide your Tax Identification Number (TIN) for each of these countries.
FORM_STEP_SUMMARY_TEXT_1: Before submitting, please ensure that all the information entered corresponds to your situation.
